original_title: Wake Up! On the Road with a Zen Master
overview: Zen Master Seung Sahnâ€™s teaching documentary is a professional and entertaining film that captures his energy while presenting the core of his teaching. "Wake Up!" is not only a rare portrait of an unusual and provocative teacher, but also an introduction to Zen Buddhism today. The film was shot on location during a teaching trip in Europe by award-winning independent filmmaker Brad Anderson.
title: Wake Up! On the Road with a Zen Master
